column2: ENGLISH
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s Crusaders
column6: Cruzados de [Root.GetTitledFirstName]

column2: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s Jihadists
column6: Yihadistas de [Root.GetTitledFirstName]

column2: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s Holy Warriors
column6: Guerreros Sagrados de [Root.GetTitledFirstName]

column2: Since the Crown of §Y$TITLE$§! is not held by a $RELIGION$ ruler, all gains will be handed over to the ruler who contributes the most to the $CRUSADE$.
column6: Dado que la corona de §Y$TITLE$§! no está en manos de un gobernante $RELIGION$, todas las ganancias se entregarán al gobernante que más contribuya a la $CRUSADE$.

column2: Will enter into an alliance with §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n
column6: Formará una alianza con §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n

column2: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will become the independent ruler of §Yall lands taken in the Crusade§!.\n
column6: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] se convertirá en gobernante independiente de §Ytodas las tierras tomadas en la Cruzada§!.

column2: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will relinquish [Root.GetHerHis] §Yprevious holdings§! and become the independent ruler of §Yall lands taken in the Crusade§!.\n
column6: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] renunciará a sus §Yantiguas posesiones§! y se convertirá en gobernante independiente de §Ytodas las tierras tomadas en la Cruzada§!.

column2: Might be granted a fief in the captured lands\n
column6: Se le podría conceder un feudo en las tierras capturadas\n

column2: A landless knight will become the independent ruler of §Yall lands taken in the Crusade§!.\n
column6: Un caballero sin tierras podría convertirse en el gobernante independiente de §Ytodas las tierras tomadas en la Cruzada§!.

column2: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! will become the independent ruler of §Yall lands taken in the Crusade§!.\n
column6: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! se convertirá en gobernante independiente de §Ytodas las tierras tomadas en la Cruzada§!.

column2: It is through the grace of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] that the [crusade_title.GetFullName] has finally been conquered. Now I must consider who shall rule this new land.
column6: Ha sido por la gracia de [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] que [crusade_title.GetFullName] ha sido conquistado. Ahora debo considerar quién reinará en esta nueva tierra.

column2: One of my children
column6: Uno de mis hijos

column2: My brother
column6: Mi hermano

column2: My sister
column6: Mi hermana

column2: A capable relative
column6: Un familiar capacitado

column2: A valiant [Root.Culture.GetName] retainer
column6: Un valiente partidario [Root.Culture.GetName]

column2: Myself, of course!
column6: ¡Yo, por supuesto!

column2: It is through the grace of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] that the [crusade_title.GetFullName] has been finally conquered. Perhaps it is worth considering whether I should request to [From.GetTitledFirstName] that a fief be granted to someone in return for my contribution to the cause?
column6: Ha sido por la gracia de [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] que [crusade_title.GetFullName] ha sido conquistado. ¿A lo mejor merezco solicitar un feudo a [From.GetTitledFirstName] por mi contribución a la causa?

column2: Request a fief for my son
column6: Solicitar un feudo para mi hijo

column2: Request a fief for my brother
column6: Solicitar un feudo para mi hermano

column2: Request a fief for a relative
column6: Solicitar un feudo para mi pariente

column2: Request a fief for a valiant retainer
column6: Solicitar un feudo para mi partidario

column2: Request a fief for myself
column6: Solicitar un feudo para mí.

column2: No, our victory belongs to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]
column6: No, nuestra victoria pertenece a [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]

column2: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is determined to join the [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName] and has gathered together a large number of recruits in [liege_capital.GetName] under [From.GetHerHis] banner. They have already begun their march to support [From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName].
column6: [From.GetTitledFirstName] está empecinado en unirse a la [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName] y ha reunido un gran ejército en [liege_capital.GetName] bajo su estandarte. Ya han empezado a marchar para apoyar [From.GetAlAla] [From.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName].

column2: The [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] is over and I have nothing to show for my struggles. What shall become of me now?
column6: La [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] ha terminado y no he conseguido nada en la batalla. ¿Qué será de mí ahora?

column2: Return home
column6: Regresar a casa

column2: Become a mercenary
column6: Convertirse en mercenario
